text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] , i , c = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < ( n - 1 ) ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) c ++ ; } c = c + n ; printf ( "%d\n" , c ) ; } return 0 ; }
